name: Space Tryharders
description:
#PAJGAMEJAM

This game was made by one person within 60 hours for the "Pot-Au-Jeu" game jam.

It is my take on Space Invaders. Modern engine and frenetic gameplay loops based on an old idea, hope you like it.

Play time: 20-60min.

Controls are shown in the game, but it is basically : Left/Right arrows, left/Right click, Scroll Wheel.

PS: I did not take care of the optimization, so please don't run the game on a potato.

Game Engine: Unity

Software: Photoshop, Filter Forge, Bfxr, Magix Music Maker.

Free assets used: Font, Earth Texture, Unity Standard Assets.
